testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the home page✅ When I select suburb Collingwood and store Collingwood, VIC, 3066✅ And I search for pipe✅ And I am in search results page✅ And I set filter "Brand=Brasshards";"Price Range=$2 - $5"✅ Then I verify brand is filtered by "Brand=Brasshards";"Price Range=$2 - $5"

testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the home page✅ When I select suburb Collingwood and store Collingwood, VIC, 3066✅ And I search for pipe✅ And I am in search results page✅ And I set filter "Shop by=Online only";"Brand=Brasshards"✅ Then I verify shopby is filtered by "Shop by=Online only";"Brand=Brasshards"
